archimate:Product.name: Elasticsearch Graph API + Kibana
archimate:Product.documentation: Elasticsearch Graph API + Kibana: the Graph API lets you map and query information about the documents and terms in your Elasticsearch index. It connects to Kibana, the open-source plugin for ES, which provides an interface to visualize the graphs. at https://www.elastic.co/products/stack/graph Is it really free? Cf. the exchange at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33242197/is-elasticsearch-is-free-or-costly
